attributes.action: I WANT TO GIVE THE HOUSE OF LORDS THE SUPPORT OF THE PEOPLE TO BLOCK BREXIT.
attributes.additional_details: NOTHING IS IMPOSSIBLE MAKE HISTORY BY SIGNING THIS PETITION WE MUST STOP TERESA MAY.
attributes.background: we all know the truth from the lies now and im asking for 17.5 million people to sign this petition or we will be out of the EU forever and i believe the UK will never be the same if this happens.The deal or no deal sums it all up the goverment will destroy this country if we dont stop them.
